channel.title: Unstable - Blusea
channel.description: So I was messing around with some melodies and I came up with something cool. Since Ive never tried anything like this before, can I get feedback on it :slight_smile: https://soundcloud.com/blusea-music/blusea-o-unstable

item.title: Unstable - Blusea
item.dc:creator: blusea
item.description:
Thanks for the feedback! I agree that the snare doesnt really fit and the drums need to be louder. Ive made a new version tweaking a couple of things
https://app.auxy.co/projects/h9BXRpJwH4LDGjvMLZ-l5A==

item.title: Unstable - Blusea
item.dc:creator: anon86704580
item.description:
I like what you did with the melody here! Real nice! My main problem however is for the drop, the drums get super drowned out by the other instruments. Get a louder snare for sure. The one chosen doesnâ€™t fit well imo. I like the bassline! Put a little less echo, and make a longer outro. Then your good to go!

Melody: 8/10
Chords: 6/10
Drums: 5/10
Bassline: 7/10
Appeal: 8/10

Overall: 34/50
